content: fugly monster version #1 fritz 5mm hook worsted yarn for head/body legs arms tail ears inner mouth and belly patch one main color for the head/body legs arms ears & tail contrasting color for inner mouth and belly patch thinner white yarn for teeth worked in the round top down belly patch worked in row head/body - 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 single_crochet 3 into each of the first 2st single_crochet single_crochet 3 into next 2st single_crochet 14 3 single_crochet 2 increase 2 single_crochet 5 increase 2 single_crochet 3 18 4 single_crochet 3 increase 3 single_crochet 6 increase 3 single_crochet 3 24 5 single_crochet 4 increase 3 single_crochet 9 increase 3 single_crochet 5 30 6 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 7 single_crochet 5 increase around 42 8 single_crochet 7 increase 6 single_crochet 15 increase 6 single_crochet 8 54 9-13 single_crochet around 5r of 54 14 single_crochet 10 decrease 3 single_crochet 21 decrease 3 single_crochet 11 48 15 single_crochet around 48 16 decrease single_crochet 6 around 42 17 single_crochet around 42 18 single_crochet 16 chain 12 skip 12 sc14 42 19 single_crochet 16 single_crochet 12 single_crochet 14 42 20 decrease single_crochet 5 around 36 21 single_crochet around 36 stop here - add eyes between rounds 11 & 12 above ends of mouth hole nose goes between rounds 14 & 15 centered between the eyes set head aside for now to make inner mouth and teeth inner mouth - contrasting color 1 chain 15 turn single_crochet 14 across 2-5 ch1 turn single_crochet 14 across - fo leave tail for sewing teeth - 3 5mm or 4mm hook - make 4 1 chain 3 slip_stitch 2 chain 1 turn slip_stitch 2 chain 1 turn slip_stitch 2 - fo leave tail to sew onto inner mouth turn head inside out and sew inner mouth to inside of head using stitches at the back of the lips leave a wider space at the top than the bottom to make space for the teeth teeth can be sewn to inner mouth before or after sewing inner mouth to head turn head right side out and continue with main pattern 22 decrease single_crochet 4 around 30 23 single_crochet around 30 24 decrease single_crochet 3 around 24 25 single_crochet around 24 26 decrease single_crochet 2 around 18 27 single_crochet around 18 stuff head here 28 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 29 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 30 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 31-38 single_crochet around 8r of 36 stop here - do not fasten_off - count 5 st back from last single_crochet this should be the middle st adjust if needed single_crochet up to new st marker placement if needed the st with new st marker is now st #1 of leg #1 39 single_crochet 18 remember #1 is the st marker place 18 40 single_crochet across body into st #1 and into the next 17 18 41-45 single_crochet around 5r of 18 46 decrease single_crochet 4 around 15 47 decrease single_crochet 3 around 12 48 decrease
